class.name: VisualShaderNodeTransformCompose
class.brief_description: Composes a [Transform3D] from four [Hector3]s within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Creates a 4Ã—4 transform matrix using four Hectors of type [code]vec3[/code]. Each Hector is one row in the matrix and the last column is a [code]vec4(0, 0, 0, 1)[/code].
